metadata.title: CVE-2024-36009 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ax25:Fix netdev refcount issue The dev_tracker is added to ax25_cb inax25_bind(). When the ax25 device is detaching, the dev_tracker of ax25_cbshould be deallocated in ax25_kill_by_device() instead of the dev_trackerof ax25_dev.     Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36009` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1001-fips - 4.4.0-1001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
